mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FR_MEMBER WHERE TRUNC(CREATE_DATE) = TRUNC(SYSDATE)
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FR_REVIEW WHERE TRUNC(CREATE_DATE) = TRUNC(SYSDATE)
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FR_REVIEW_REPLY WHERE TRUNC(CREATE_DATE) = TRUNC(SYSDATE)

WITH date_range AS ( SELECT TRUNC(SYSDATE) - LEVEL + 1 AS target_date FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <= 7 ) SELECT TO_CHAR(dr.target_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS signupDate, NVL(COUNT(m.MEMBER_NO), 0) AS count FROM date_range dr LEFT JOIN FR_MEMBER m ON TRUNC(m.CREATE_DATE) = dr.target_date GROUP BY dr.target_date ORDER BY dr.target_date ASC
SELECT T.TAG_TITLE AS tagName , COUNT(RT.REVIEW_NO) count FROM FR_REVIEW_TAG RT LEFT JOIN FR_TAG T ON T.TAG_NO = RT.TAG_NO GROUP BY T.TAG_NO , T.TAG_TITLE ORDER BY count DESC FETCH FIRST 5 ROWS ONLY
